title: Model Railways - Right Track 5 - Landscapes 1
description:
Right Track 5 - Modelling Landscapes 1 [H265, Random002] 1Hr:45



Since these DVDs are not available anymore, remember there are others like you who would like this material so PLEASE SEED ;-)


Right Track 5 - Modelling Landscapes: Part 1

Barry Norman is well known throughout the model railway hobby for his layouts of Lydham Heath and Petherick. You may also have seen his books: "Designing a Layout" and "Landscape Modelling"

In this, the first of two programmes, Barry shows how he lays the basis for his excellent model railway scenes.

Beginning by researching the prototype, he explains the methods he uses to find the details he will need for the completed model.

He then describes how he designs the layout to include the most interesting aspects of the prototype and show them to their best effect.

Having designed the layout, he then sets about the more practical aspects of baseboard construction and making landforms before laying , texturing, colouring and detailing the landscape.

Laying, painting and weathering the track area and fencing is covered and the programme closes with a guided photographic tour of his two most well-known layouts. 

Contents of the DVD

The DVD contains the following sections: -

 Researching the Prototype
 Layout Design
 Baseboard Construction
 Laying Track
 Making Landforms
 Laying Grass
 Colour Mixing
 Landscape Colouring
 Landscape Detailing
 Painting and Weathering Track
 Fencing
 A Guide to Lytham Heath and Petherick 

Important: Resolution = 768 x 576. However, I have encoded these from 8GB to a reasonable uploading size, so there will be the odd loss of definition here and there.
I used the H265 format, so if you have difficulty playing this file I suggest you download a media player like VLC
